snippet.title: PC Engine Longplay [300] Genpei Toumaden
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: NPI

This is the prequel to Samurai Ghost.

One of the weirdest games ever to be made. Enemies fly around the screen like crazy. Thanks to a few other youtube videos, I have managed to beat this game. Apparently to beat the last boss you need to collect three artifacts (they are displayed above each time you collect one of them). Otherwise he is unbeatable. -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
